item.title: Install 1Album Blackbox
item.description: 1Album Blackbox is the storage backend for 1Album. It can be installed on Windows, Mac OSX, Linux, NAS devices, or any environment that can run a Docker container.

item.title: Sign in to 1Album app
item.description: Install 1Album app on your iPhone or iPad and sign in with your Facebook account. Other sign in methods are comming.

item.title: Link 1Album Blackbox to your account
item.description: Link 1Album Blackbox to your account by entering your blackbox’s device code in 1Album app.

Now 1Album app will back up photos and videos on your iPhone and iPad to your 1Album Blackbox automatically. You can delete the backed up items from your phone to free up space.

You have access to all photos and videos from your iPhone or iPad. They are served directly from the blackbox through a peer-to-peer connection.
